core

类 DataSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.DataSet
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Externalizable, java.io.Serializable

    public class DataSet
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Externalizable
    The data class contains the examples, which may have multiply frames. _sub_lists: denote which frames will be included in each examples. _select_lists: the selection of the subset only role on the examples. _select_subset: the set of the frames due to the selection of the examples. If some examples have been selected, the data will select the frames belongs to them. _subset_stack: used for the selection and the recovery of the examples set.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格
